name: World Soccer Winning Eleven 6 International
synopsis: Winning Eleven 6 International finally makes its way to the United States. This installment re-creates the game of soccer with lifelike player models, detailed stadiums, and challenging gameplay. Create your own dream team of players, complete with a customizable formation, playing style, and player lineup. Simple controls allow you to perform straightforward passes, through balls, long balls, early crosses, and shots with ease. With fluid controls, realistic players, and new animations, Winning Eleven 6 mimics the speed and passion of real-life soccer.
